fullDescription.intro: This is the PIA Analysis for a PIA intermediate file generated by the PIA Compiler.
fullDescription.option: Description of options will come soon.

ports.inPort: A PIA XML file from a table, may be gzipped. This would be the default output of the PIA Compiler. Either this or a file in port 1 must be given.
A PIA XML file from a file port, e.g. from Input File. Either this or a file in port 0 must be given.
An optional spectrum file for the spectrum viewer (not yet fully implemented).
ports.outPort: The results on the PSM level.
The results on the peptide level.
The results on the protein level.
The generated export file. (not yet implemented)

views.view: The PIA Analysis view: browse the PSM, peptide and protein results and visualisation.
